item.description: A variety of local and international guitarists performing a gamut of musical styles. Daniel Salazar, Jr. takes the evening stage accompanied by the Hartford Festival Orchestra in this signature concert featuring Spanish, Latin, and World Music. In addition, several of New England’s top guitarists will perform a variety of music styles throughout the afternoon. Food and beverages including beer and wine will be available for purchase. Rain Date: Sunday September 11th Location: Mortensen Riverfront Plaza Parking is free at the Morgan St. Garage on the weekends. http://www.riverfront...
item.name: Sat. 9/10 - Free Classical, World, & other guitar acts on Hartford riverfront
